document.full_text: microsoft corp is not planning any more versions of its unpopular zune digital media player, but is to continue offering music and video using the same software online, through its xbox game console and on its windows phones.
document.title: microsoft to phase out unsuccessful zune player
lines_and_colors: microsoft corp is not planning any more versions of its unpopular zune digital media player, but is to continue offering music and video using the same software online, through its xbox game console and on its windows phones.
